name: Rhapsody Desk
description: Inspired by the original Rhapsody lamp, by her fiancée Patrick Coard Paris, Kifu Paris designs a sculptural writing desk as an ode to his iconic lighting collection. The tabletop is inlaid in cream shagreen and sits on 4 bronze-patina brass 'rhapsody' legs that are a mixture of solid and cut-out shapes. Add a mirror and this piece comes a vanity. Available in other iterations as a breakfast table, console and side table.
